name: MC Chris
description: '''Christopher Brendan Ward IV''', better known by the stage name '''MC Chris''' (stylized in all [[lower case]]), is an American rapper, voice actor, comedian, and writer. He is recognized for his high-pitched voice and for blending his "[[geek]]” background with a “[[gangsta rap]]” persona, contributing to the popularization of the [[nerdcore]] genre. He has released ten albums, five EPs, one re-release, and a tenth-anniversary edition of his recordings with [[Dirt Bike Annie|the Lee Majors]]. He is also known for his work on [[Cartoon Network]]'s [[Adult Swim]] programming block.
